oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pharmakinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Subacute Oral Toxicity of Cyclosporine-A (CyA) in Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vaden, Shelly L.
Riviere, J. Edmond
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cy-A
pharmacokinetics
pharmacodynamics
subacute oral toxicity
graduate research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This investigation evaluated the pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, and subacute oral toxicity of CyA in pigs. Nine 3-4 month old female Yorkshire pigs were given 10 mg/kg Cy A IV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Sixth Biennial Symposium; 121
